Sentencas: This work is aimed at the formation of dense anode coatings of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and samarium-doped barium cerate BaCe0.8Sm0.2O3-$ (BCS) on the Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-$ electrolyte to increase the performance of a single fuel cell on its base.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of dense anode barrier layers of doped ZrO2 and BaCeO3 on a supporting Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-d solid electrolyte: Problems and search for solutions in SOFC technology

Sentencas: Materials are obtained by precipitation from a nitrate solution (YSZ-disp), by laser vaporization condensation (YSZ-lec) and citrate-nitrate method (BCS).
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of dense anode barrier layers of doped ZrO2 and BaCeO3 on a supporting Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-d solid electrolyte: Problems and search for solutions in SOFC technology

Sentencas: YSZ and BCS coatings on SDC substrates were obtained by electrophoretic deposition (EPD) followed by sintering at 1300-1500 & DEG;C. Two methods are applied to ensure surface conductivity of the SDC substrates for successful EPD: by synthesizing a conducting polymer polypyrrole and by depositing a buffer layer of finely dispersed Pt.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of dense anode barrier layers of doped ZrO2 and BaCeO3 on a supporting Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-d solid electrolyte: Problems and search for solutions in SOFC technology

Sentencas: The main problem of the formation of the dense YSZ layers on the SDC substrates has been revealed, which is associated with their delamination during high-temperature sintering due to thermal expansion mismatch.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of dense anode barrier layers of doped ZrO2 and BaCeO3 on a supporting Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-d solid electrolyte: Problems and search for solutions in SOFC technology

Sentencas: It is shown that the use of a Pt buffer sublayer makes it possible to avoid delamination during sintering at a temperature of 1500 & DEG;C. The BCS barrier layers are shown to be completely compatible with SDC.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of dense anode barrier layers of doped ZrO2 and BaCeO3 on a supporting Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-d solid electrolyte: Problems and search for solutions in SOFC technology

Sentencas: The influence of the YSZ and BCS barrier layers on the ohmic and polarization resistance values and the open circuit voltage (OCV) values is discussed. & COPY; 2023 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of dense anode barrier layers of doped ZrO2 and BaCeO3 on a supporting Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-d solid electrolyte: Problems and search for solutions in SOFC technology
